requirements: Open to advanced undergraduates with permission of the instructor.
description:
An introduction to the historiography of the Ottoman Empire. Readings include classics in the field as well as examples of recent trends and innovative new works. Emphasis is placed on methodology, source usage, questions or periodization, and other interpretive problems. All students should read Caroline Finkel’s Osman’s Dream for the first meeting.
Open to advanced undergraduates with permission of the instructor.
title: Readings in Ottoman History
